name: V-Empire
description:
Be a vampire in search of human blood in this game made for Ludum Dare 39 themed Running out of Power.

Run away from the monks while you search for human blood to survive! 

Attack the villagers to restore the power of evil.

Use the Shapeshifting abilities to escape from religious folk hunting vampires.

The game is over when you are caught or run out of evil power.

Controls:

WASD or Directionals: Walk

J: Attack villagers

K: Transform into bat
